description: A challenging retro arcade FPS/TPS straight from the late '90s. The Crime Wars have started and it's up to the Ultra Cops to bring back ultimate justice. Use Mechs, Riot Cars and serious firepower to bring the pain to the criminal underworld in this 6th Generation Y2K inspired game.

title: Twas The Night Demo
description: Build and manage Santa's North Pole mega-workshop in this festive city builder where workshops produce toys for the world's children. Spend Christmas Spirit to create new holiday traditions and upgrade your workshops, but lose your spirit and you'll cease to exist.

title: Biohazard: Siberia Demo
description: Trapped in a secret research facility, you discover a terrifying truth- everything was a simulation… until now. Escape mutated horrors, uncover dark experiments, and decide your fate in this mind-bending, atmospheric survival horror.

title: ViCrew
description: ViCrew is a tactical RPG with turn based combat in which you build a crew of Vikings to go on glorious raids. Explore random generated maps and plunder as much as you can. Level your characters and get strong enough to beat the toughest enemies.

title: Liar's Dice
description: Face off against a demonic entity in a high-stakes game of liar’s dice, where losing means your soul.

title: Past Fate
description: Past Fate is an open world MMORPG set in medieval fantasy world where the players freedom is the key element. Choose what you will become and explore the vast world and its continents for hidden secrets and mysteries. What is your fate?
genre: ['Action', 'Indie', 'Massively Multiplayer', 'RPG', 'Early Access', 'Icy North Games', 'Icy North Games']

title: Autonomous Odyssey
description: Autonomous Odyssey is a story-driven, hand-drawn 2D metroidvania. Use agile platforming on your apocalyptic sci-fi journey to explore the labs once filled with exceptional researchers. Fight through vengeful robots on Pim’s quest to find his missing father and restore everyone's humanity.

title: DuaLight
description: In this challenging cyberpunk platformer switch between day and night environments, go through dangerous obstacles by manipulating gravity and time. Upgrade your abilities to conquer these levels with an intense soundtrack. Are you ready for the ultimate adrenaline rush?

title: Exterminant Demo
description: Exterminant is a small casual game where you exterminate every bug you find to feed your killing machine. Research new technologies to increase your destruction power and create powerful decks using your new tech.

title: Storm the Swan - And the Power of FRIENDSHIP and IMAGINATION
description: Make Cute Animal Friends in this 8-bit Gameboy-inspired adventure! But there's something lurking in the woods, with DARK SECRETS you'll need to uncover!

title: Hot Wax Demo
description: Small arcade puzzler where you place falling candles and light them up to create slowly-unfolding chain reactions.

title: Beyond the Ordinary
description: A minimalist art-inspired game that reimagines classic mini-games with visual artistry, world-class music, and philosophical insights.

title: Drift Halls
description: Explore liminal spaces and control world lighting in real-time with the press of a button. Secrets can be revealed by the light or the dark. Search for signs of life and use your radio to catch any stray broadcasts. Learn the secrets of the Drift Halls, or simply take in the sights.

title: Sacrilegious
description: As a powerful female warrior, travel to new sections with different maps in each section, defeat enemies, collect loot and improve your equipment. Survive in this ever-changing world using strategy and skills.
